words.description: The ability to transact without permission from any authority. Bitcoin restores financial self-determination.
You hold your own keys, your own wealth. No intermediary can freeze, seize, or deny access.
Independence from institutional gatekeepers. Your money answers only to you.
No application required. No approval needed. Anyone can participate in the network.
Each holder is their own bank, their own central authority over their wealth.
testing
An immutable ledger that cannot lie. Every transaction is verifiable, transparent, and permanent.
No entity can alter the rules, manipulate supply, or corrupt the protocol for personal gain.
Open-source code and a public ledger. Anyone can audit, verify, and trust through verification.
What is written cannot be erased. The ledger is permanent and tamper-proof.
No need to trust any party. The protocol enforces rules through mathematics, not promises.
The absolute, unalterable cap. No more can ever exist. Digital scarcity perfected.
Unlike fiat which can be printed infinitely, Bitcoin has mathematical limits baked into its code.
Money that cannot be debased or diluted. Its purchasing power is protected by code.
Collateral with no counterparty risk. An asset that is no one's liability.
As adoption grows against fixed supply, each unit represents more of the world's value.
Attacks make it stronger. Each challenge overcome proves and improves the network.
No single point of failure. Thousands of nodes across the globe ensure survival.
No government, corporation, or individual can stop a valid transaction.
Running continuously since 2009. The network has never been successfully attacked or shut down.
Emerged spontaneously without central planning. Grew through voluntary adoption, not mandate.
No privileges, no special access. Everyone plays by the same rules enforced by code.
Adoption by choice, not coercion. People opt in because they recognize its value.
Simple rules create complex, beautiful order. Satoshi's design is minimalist perfection.
Real energy expenditure secures the network. Unforgeable costliness creates true value.
Anchored to physical reality through energy consumption. Not abstract promises but real resources.
Security backed by the laws of physics. Attacking requires expending real-world energy.
Mining incentivizes renewable energy development and utilizes stranded power.
The longer it survives, the longer it's likely to survive. Each year adds to its life expectancy.
Rewards low time preference. Encourages saving over consumption, planning over impulse.
Wealth that can be passed down intact. A store of value for centuries, not just years.
Designed to outlast institutions, governments, and perhaps civilizations.
Cannot lie about supply, cannot hide transactions, cannot pretend to be what it's not.
Challenges the most powerful institutions on Earth. A peaceful revolution in money.
No central authority claims credit. No face on the coin. The protocol serves, not rules.
Offers a path to sound money for all humanity. A tool for human flourishing.
Legal tender laws force acceptance. You have no choice but to use their money.
Every transaction requires approval. Banks, governments, and payment processors are gatekeepers.
Accounts frozen, transactions blocked, access denied. Your money is only yours if they allow it.
Every transaction tracked, recorded, analyzed. Financial privacy is extinct.
Bail-ins, asset freezes, civil forfeiture. They can take what they claim is yours.
Central bank decisions made in closed rooms. The true money supply is unknowable.
Interest rates, money supply, exchange rates—all artificially controlled.
Created from nothing with a keystroke. No backing, no constraint, no substance.
Inflation is called 'stimulus.' Money printing is 'quantitative easing.' Lies wrapped in jargon.
Fractional reserve banking creates money that doesn't exist. A system built on accounting fiction.
The silent tax that steals purchasing power while you sleep. Your savings evaporate.
Those closest to the money printer benefit first. Everyone else pays through rising prices.
The profit governments extract by creating money worth more than its cost to produce.
Bail-ins turn depositors into unwilling bank investors. Your money becomes their capital.
Single points of failure everywhere. One decision, one hack, one policy can collapse it all.
Requires constant intervention to prevent collapse. Held together by faith and force.
Relies on trusted third parties at every step. Trust that is regularly betrayed.
Human administrators can be bribed, threatened, or simply make mistakes.
Boom and bust cycles engineered by monetary policy. Volatility by design.
Every unit becomes worth less over time. Designed to lose value. Guaranteed to fail.
Average fiat currency lifespan: 27 years. All eventually go to zero.
The mathematical endpoint of compound inflation is always hyperinflation or collapse.
Too much debt, too much printing. The system cannot be reformed, only replaced.
Designed by committees, imposed by decree. Nothing natural about it.
Rules change on political whims. What's allowed today may be forbidden tomorrow.
Disconnected from physical reality. Numbers on screens backed by nothing but promises.
Layers of administration extract value and add friction. Paper-pushers everywhere.
